name: Luis Cruz 0002
content: Luís Cruz Luís Cruz LinkedIn | Github | Google Scholar | Twitter | Orcid E-mail: L.Cruz@tudelft.nl Interests: Green AI, Green Software, AI Engineering Luís Cruz [ Research | Publications | Teaching | Blog ] Web Assistant Professor at TU Delft. Software Engineering Research Group, Delft University of Technology. Web Master coordinator in the Computer Science MSc programme. Delft University of Technology. Web Scientific Coordinator of the ICAI lab AI4Fintech Research ING and TU Delft. Ph.D. Thesis Tools and Techniques for Energy-Efficient Mobile Application Development Ph.D. thesis defended on July 2, 2019. Web Energy Patterns for Mobile Apps Online Catalog with 22 patterns to improve the energy efficiency of iOS and Android apps. PDF Download Curriculum Vitae Updated on June, 2024.
